reuters.title: KAYABA INDUSTRY ISSUES 50 MLN SWISS FRANC NOTES
reuters.body: Kayaba Industry Co Ltd is privately placing 50 mln Swiss francs of five year straight notes with a 4-3/4 pct coupon and 100.25 issue price, lead manager Credit Suisse said. Payment is due March 31. The issue is guaranteed by Fuji Bank Ltd. REUTER 
